update s_destination
continentId=#{continentId},
countryId=#{countryId},
map_lat=#{mapLat},
map_lng=#{mapLng},
sequence=#{sequence},
ctdt=#{ctdt},
ctuser=#{ctuser},
upuser=#{upuser},
updt=#{updt}
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT s.id,s.`continentId`,s.`countryId`,s.`sequence`,c.`cityName` AS continentName,sc.cityName AS countryName FROM s_destination s LEFT JOIN city c ON s.`continentId` = c.`id` LEFT JOIN (SELECT cc.id, cc.cityName FROM s_destination ss LEFT JOIN city cc ON cc.`id` = ss.`countryId`) sc ON sc.id = s.countryId where s.id=#{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM s_destinationproduct sd WHERE sd.`destinationId`=#{destinationId} AND sd.`productId`=#{productId}

SELECT t.id,p.pname,p.ptype,p.supplier_no,p.country,p.pid, c.cityName, s.s_name FROM product AS p LEFT JOIN city AS c ON p.country = c.id LEFT JOIN suppliers AS s ON p.supplier_no = s.sid LEFT JOIN s_destinationproduct AS t ON p.`pid`=t.`productId` WHERE t.`destinationId`=#{id}
SELECT p.* FROM s_destination as d LEFT JOIN s_destinationproduct as s on(s.destinationId = d.id) LEFT JOIN product as p on(p.pid = s.productId) where p.enddate >= SYSDATE() and d.id = #{desId}
